item.title: DONE. relmitos Helped All way throught THANK YOU DUDE EVERYONE REP HIM PLEASE
item.dc:creator: @relmitos relmitos
item.description:
@relmitos wrote:

Yes, just add this in your shops.cfg:

shop = 100	shop				2	2	995	1

You can change the prices for the items that the shop is selling in your item.cfg.
It will be changed from coins to slayer points automatic.

Read full topic

item.title: DONE. relmitos Helped All way throught THANK YOU DUDE EVERYONE REP HIM PLEASE
item.dc:creator: @relmitos relmitos
item.description:
@relmitos wrote:

Scroll down untill you see: “if(MyShopID == 19”. And add below code under above it.

                if (MyShopID == 100) {
                    if (slayerPoint >= TotPrice2) {
                        if (freeSlots() > 0) {
                            slayerPoint -= TotPrice2;
                            addItem(itemID, 1);
                            server.shopHandler.ShopItemsN[MyShopID][fromSlot] -= 1;
                            server.shopHandler.ShopItemsDelay[MyShopID][fromSlot] = 0;
                            if ((fromSlot + 1)
                                    > server.shopHandler.ShopItemsStandard[MyShopID]) {
                                server.shopHandler.ShopItems[MyShopID][fromSlot] = 0;
                            }
                        } else {
                            sM("Not enough space in your inventory.");
                            break;
                        }
                    } else {
                        sM("Not enough points for this item.");
                    }
                }

Also, make a new shop in your shops.cfg

shop = 100	shop				2	2	995	1

Read full topic
